2.caption_en:
A one-page "Platform Monetization Canvas v3.0" template showing left-side cost columns (Operational, Acquisition, Unit Costs), right-side revenue blocks for Consumers/Producers/Partners, and large footer areas for Total Costs and Total Revenue with a QR code in the bottom-right.

{
  "type": "template/canvas",
  "title": "Platform Monetization Canvas",
  "version": "v3.0",
  "orientation": "landscape",
  "language": "english",
  "visual_summary": {
    "layout": "two-column canvas with left cost columns and right revenue blocks, footer totals across width",
    "colors": [
      "white",
      "light gray",
      "dark gray",
      "red (thin outline)",
      "green (thin outline)",
      "yellow/orange (thin outline)",
      "blue (footer accent)"
    ],
    "icons": ["qr_code_bottom_right"],
    "graphic_elements": ["thin colored vertical separators on right", "downward triangle markers between sections"]
  },
  "sections": [
    {
      "name": "Left Columns - Costs",
      "position": "left",
      "columns": [
        {
          "label": "OPERATIONAL COSTS",
          "content": "empty input fields/lines for listing operational cost items",
          "outline_color": "none",
          "relative_width": 0.28
        },
        {
          "label": "ACQUISITION COSTS",
          "content": "empty input fields/lines for listing acquisition cost items",
          "outline_color": "none",
          "relative_width": 0.28
        },
        {
          "label": "UNIT COSTS",
          "content": "empty input fields/lines for listing unit cost items",
          "outline_color": "none",
          "relative_width": 0.28
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Right Grid - Revenues & Stakeholders",
      "position": "right",
      "subsections": [
        {
          "label": "CONSUMERS REVENUES",
          "position": "top-right",
          "boxes": [
            "Transactions",
            "Data Insights",
            "Other"
          ],
          "vertical_sidebar_label": "CONSUMERS",
          "sidebar_color": "red",
          "relative_height": 0.30
        },
        {
          "label": "PRODUCERS REVENUES",
          "position": "middle-right",
          "boxes": [
            "Transactions",
            "Data Insights",
            "Other"
          ],
          "vertical_sidebar_label": "PRODUCERS",
          "sidebar_color": "green",
          "relative_height": 0.30
        },
        {
          "label": "PARTNERS REVENUES",
          "position": "bottom-right",
          "boxes": [
            "Transactions",
            "Data Insights",
            "Other"
          ],
          "vertical_sidebar_label": "PARTNERS",
          "sidebar_color": "yellow",
          "relative_height": 0.30
        }
      ],
      "relative_width": 0.44
    },
    {
      "name": "Totals / Footer",
      "position": "bottom-center",
      "elements": [
        {
          "label": "TOTAL COSTS",
          "position": "left-footer",
          "background_color": "light gray",
          "relative_width": 0.48
        },
        {
          "label": "TOTAL REVENUE",
          "position": "right-footer",
          "background_color": "light gray",
          "relative_width": 0.48
        }
      ],
      "decor": "centered downward triangle markers above footer areas"
    }
  ],
  "detected_text": [
    "OPERATIONAL COSTS",
    "ACQUISITION COSTS",
    "UNIT COSTS",
    "CONSUMERS REVENUES",
    "PRODUCERS REVENUES",
    "PARTNERS REVENUES",
    "TOTAL COSTS",
    "TOTAL REVENUE",
    "PLATFORM MONETIZATION CANVAS v3.0",
    "CONSUMERS",
    "PRODUCERS",
    "PARTNERS"
  ],
  "notes": {
    "fillable": true,
    "designed_for": "workshop/strategy sessions to map platform monetization",
    "qr_code_present": true,
    "paper_aspect_ratio": "approx 16:11 (landscape)"
  }
}
